Error.description:
Unfortunately we encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were trying to visit.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the use of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the language in the top right corner and see how the content changes.
IndexPage.title: NextJS Internationalization Example

LogoutPage.logged_out_description: Thank you for using our service. You have been successfully logged out.

NotFoundPage.description: Please check the address in your browser's address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.
NotFoundPage.title: Page not found

SignInForm.to_start: To get started, enter your email address.
SignInForm.enter_with_your_google_account: Sign in with your Google account
SignInForm.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
SignInForm.min_password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
SignInForm.oauth_account_not_linked: This Google account is already linked to a different user. Please sign in with your original account or use a different Google account.
SignInForm.account_linking_failed: We could not link your Google account. Please try again or contact support.
SignInForm.oauth_signin_error: There was a problem signing in with Google. Please try again.
SignInForm.oauth_callback_error: There was a problem with the Google authentication. Please try again.
SignInForm.general_error: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again.

EmailForm.insert_your_email: To get started, enter your email address.
EmailForm.i_agree: I agree to the <terms>Terms and Conditions</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
EmailForm.sign_up_with_google: Sign up with your Google account
EmailForm.must_agree_to_terms: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy to continue
EmailForm.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address

PasswordForm.set_a_password: Set a secure password to protect your account
PasswordForm.min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long

PersonalForm.provide_the_essential_informations: Provide the essential information to complete your profile

CalendarForm.connect_calendar_description: Connect your Google Calendar to manage your availability and appointments.
CalendarForm.want_to_fill_later: Want to fill this in later?
CalendarForm.error_connecting_calendar: There was an error connecting to your Google Calendar. Please try again.
CalendarForm.error_selecting_calendar: There was an error selecting your calendar. Please try again.

CalendarSelect.select_calendar_description: Choose which calendar you want to use for your appointments.
CalendarSelect.error_selecting_calendar: There was an error selecting your calendar. Please try again.

EndingPage.your_account_is_ready: Your account is ready to use

VerifyEmailPage.please_wait: Please wait while we verify your email address...
VerifyEmailPage.success_message: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now sign in to your account.
VerifyEmailPage.missing_params: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please try again.

CheckEmailPage.verification_email_sent: We've sent a verification email to {email}
CheckEmailPage.click_link_in_email: Click the link in the email to verify your account and sign in.

PasswordRecoveryPage.enter_email_for_reset: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
PasswordRecoveryPage.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address

ResetPasswordPage.invalid_link_description: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
ResetPasswordPage.min_password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
